entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Pointe-à-la-Croix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 11:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: W 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
